
snap(0,-25,-99)

sky(50,50,50)
fog(50,50,50)
ground(100,100,100)


fadefrom(13865)

name(A Rough Ride)

nlaps(1)

set(10,0,0,250,0)p
set(28,0,4900,250,0)pr
chk(40,0,4900,-200,180)
set(10,0,9800,250,0)p
set(28,0,14700,250,0)pr
chk(40,0,14700,-200,180)
set(14,0,18600,250,0)pt
set(28,3900,18600,250,90)pr
chk(40,3900,18600,-200,90)
set(14,7800,18600,250,180)pt
set(10,7800,22900,250,0)p
set(28,7800,27000,250,0)pr
chk(40,7800,27800,-200,0)
set(28,7800,32100,250,0)pr
chk(40,7800,32100,-200,0)
set(14,7800,36000,250,-90)pt
set(13,3210,34490,250,-60)p
set(14,-1380,32980,250,0)pt
.set(26,-1380,30980,250,180)pr
.chk(40,-1380,30390,-200,0)
.set(22,-1380,30420,250,0)
.set(22,-1380,30360,250,0)
.set(26,-1380,29800,250,0)pr
set(14,-1380,29800,250,90)pt
set(13,2210,30590,250,-60)p
set(28,7800,32100,250,90)pr
chk(40,7800,32100,-200,90)
set(28,12800,32100,250,90)pr
